summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 36th Street from 47th Avenue Northeast to a point approximately 275 feet east of 47th avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115068 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
